decisions.title: Dedicated Veo3Service Architecture
decisions.description: Created a dedicated Veo3Service to separate responsibilities between image generation (NanoBanana) and video generation (Veo3), facilitating easier maintenance and scaling as the Gen-AI platform evolves.
alternatives: Integrate Veo3 methods directly into NanoBananaService
Create a generic GenAiService for both images and videos

decisions.title: Unified Paginated Media API
decisions.description: Implemented a paginated /media endpoint that supports both images and videos, allowing easier discovery of all exercise assets in a single call while providing streaming capabilities for video playback.
alternatives: Single endpoint for all media (images + videos)
Separate endpoints for images and videos
